tool_description: Manages price alerts and notifications for wishlist items including setting thresholds, monitoring price changes, and sending alerts.

action.description: Action to perform: create_alert, update_alert, delete_alert, check_alerts, list_alerts

alert_type.description: Type of alert: price_drop, target_price, back_in_stock

threshold_percentage.description: Percentage drop threshold for price_drop alerts (1-50)

notification_method.description: Notification method: email, sms, push, all

error_messages: Invalid action: Use one of [create_alert, update_alert, delete_alert, check_alerts, list_alerts].
Missing item ID: item_id is required for create_alert, update_alert, and delete_alert actions.
Invalid alert type: Use one of [price_drop, target_price, back_in_stock].
Invalid threshold: Percentage must be between 1 and 50 for price_drop alerts.
Invalid target price: Target price must be a positive number for target_price alerts.
Invalid notification method: Use one of [email, sms, push, all].
Alert already exists: Price alert for this item already exists for the user.
usage: Specify user_id and action. For creating/updating alerts, provide item_id, alert_type, and relevant threshold or target price. Choose notification method as needed.

alert_id.description: Unique identifier for the created or updated alert

active_alerts.description: Array of active alert IDs for the user

triggered_alerts.description: Array of recently triggered alert IDs

operation_status.description: Status of the requested operation (success, failed, pending)
